title: Macbook Pro A2159 unable to install system
message:
Most of the time -1008f error, -1007f came up once.
Unable to get to recovery mode, can get to USB boot and internet recovery but after the timer gets to 0 it gives the same error every time.

System was deleted during attempted factory reset by user so there is no system to access on it.

title: Macbook Pro A2159 unable to install system
Macbook Pro A2159 unable to install system
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 102548, member: 682"]
Did you try DFU restore?
[/QUOTE]
This worked thank you, recovery mode is now accessible again.
